configuration.stem: Decide which type of reproduction is most advantageous for each condition.

feedBack.firstWrongHint: Think back to your comparison of asexual and sexual reproduction.
feedBack.finalWrongHint: Asexual reproduction results in genetically identical offspring and can be advantageous if environmental conditions are stable because favorable traits are maintained in the population. Sexual reproduction results in offspring that are genetically different from either parent, so they may have new traits that could allow them to survive in a changing environment.
